CSS_property.summary: The _property CSS at-rule is part of the CSS Houdini umbrella of APIs. It allows developers to explicitly define their {{cssxref('--*', 'CSS custom properties')}}, allowing for property type checking and constraining, setting default values, and defining whether a custom property can inherit values or not.

remarks.para: The _property rule represents a custom property registration directly in a stylesheet without having to run any JS. Valid _property rules result in a registered custom property, as if had been called with equivalent parameters.
